basics.name: Fakrul Islam Tushar
basics.label: PhD Candidate in Medical Imaging AI
basics.summary: PhD Candidate at Duke University focusing on AI and In-Silico trials for lung cancer screening and diagnosis.

work.name: Duke Radiology
work.summary: Conducted research in AI and radiology, focusing on lung health imaging.

education.summary: Research focuses on AI and In-Silico trials in lung health.
An interdisciplinary program focusing on advanced medical imaging techniques.

awards.title: Best Poster
awards.summary: Awarded for exceptional research presentation on Virtual Imaging Trials.

awards.title: Cum Laude
awards.summary: Graduated with distinction for exceptional academic performance.

projects.name: Virtual Lungs Screening Trials (VLST)
projects.summary: An in-silico alternative to clinical trials using digital human twin models, virtual scanners, and AI readers.

projects.name: Transparency in Health AI
projects.summary: Exploring the transparency and limitations of AI in medical applications.
highlights: Published in IEEE Access and SPIE22
